name: Super Super Space Shuttle Simulator
description:
A party-game in which players must work together to press specific buttons in order to maintain safe space flight. Fail too many times and the ship will burn and explode. Complete all instructions and try to get the highest score. The mouse will control the camera. The difficulty is purposely moderately high to simulate the stress of piloting a shuttle. Difficulty increases with more players.

Score 100 points for every correct button press and lose 50 points for hitting a hidden trap. Leaderboard only shows the highest score for each player amount, as difficulty increases with more players.

Final Game for DM-2153

Collaborators:
Dylan Filingeri, Julian Molina-Goni, Eric Tenaglia, Nannan Yao
